name: Flavery
description:
Our mobile app connects customers with shisha lounges. Customer can order shisha deliveries or book shisha tables. 

Our vision is that every adult in the world can enjoy high quality shisha experiences. 

Our mission is to build a global shisha brand by using technology to connect consumers with high quality shisha experiences. 

Flavery is the first app in the world that allows on-demand shisha delivery - we're creating new markets for shisha delivery and shisha table bookings.
marketTags: B2B · SaaS · Mobile · Artificial Intelligence / Machine Learning

team.name: Wahab Ahmad
team.bioHtml: Product Manager. Founder of an Angel Funded Startup. Actuary. BSc Mathematics at Bristol Uni.

jobs.title: Growth Hacker - Acquisition
jobs.description:
We're looking for a person to drive customer acquisition through our new app - Flavery. The ideal candidate would have at least one years experience in growth hacking or a related role. 

Responsibilities:-
* Drive initiatives aimed at increasing acquisition, conversion and engagement

* Own all channels of communication with customers including Email Marketing, SMS and Push notification

* Interact with founders and tech team to implement growth strategies and product roadmap pertaining to growth and retention

Skills & Qualifications
* Experiences in bootstrapping and working on early stage products  

* Strong analytical skills with orientation to solve problems

* Strategizing, measuring and improving drip Marketing campaigns to increase user LTV and retention.

* Experience in Marketing Automation tools and CRM like CleverTap,Netcore,Moengage etc.

* Experience in creating creative campaigns and understanding of customer journeys in B2B and B2C products

jobs.title: Account Manager
jobs.description:
We’re looking for a passionate Account Manager with solid experience in account acquisition and retention to contribute to Flavery's launch and evolution.

What you’ll be doing

* As our first Account Manager you will be responsible for signing up and retaining shisha lounges. 
* Collaborating with internal experts to ensure that every lounge understands exactly how Flavery works
* Turning rapport into relationships by taking the time to understand lounge's problems and how they do business
* Championing all of our shisha lounges - you win when our lounges win. 
* Working directly with our founders to constantly improve our processes.

This role is for you if:

* You have a successful track record of managing client acquisition and retention processes within B2B SaaS companies
* You’re happy being our first Account Manager; you’ll have a direct impact on our bottom line and help us build and develop processes in order to grow the team.
* You prioritise your own workload effectively and relish working independently, but (and it’s a big but) you equally love and see the value in collaborating within your team and with our wider commercial functions
* You are commercially driven, however, you value your trust relationship with customers
* You’re obsessive about continuous learning - both when it comes to industry knowledge and trends and fine-tuning your own performance
* You thrive advocating for a product that you believe in; our success is built by our people and so we are looking for you to represent our passion, energy and commitment externally
* You can communicate complex technical ideas, simply

Nice to have:

* Fluent in Russian, Turkish and/or German

jobs.title: Intern - Business Development
jobs.description:
We are seeking an intern to support our business development activities in acquiring and launching new venues onto our app. 

You must be entrepreneurial, with an ability to show tenacity and find answers through your network, or own resolve. Your work will have a direct impact on our growing user base in a totally new and competitive market.

Key accountabilities:
• Generate leads and convert prospect venues
• Follow up and convert inbound leads
• Contact by phone, email, and face to face will be required
• Accurately build and maintain venue listings
• Ensure venues maintain a high level of service to Flavery customers
• Support business development strategy

Essential skills & experience:
• Drive and determination to hit targets
• Experience of presenting to groups of individuals face to face
• Ability to negotiate the best possible deal
• Clear, concise communication skills
• Careful attention to detail as, with all sales roles, correct input of data into listings & CRM is critical
• Ability to work on own initiative and manage a varied workload according to formal and natural deadlines
